title: AccuWeather brings hyperlocal forecasts for Premium Plus subscribers
content:
Mobile weather apps are almost as old as the phones themselves. They’re essential tools that users rely on every single day to predict the local weather and take action accordingly. However, finding a reliable and accurate weather app has always been an obstacle. Apple buying Dark Sky and shutting it down on Android didn’t help

The post AccuWeather brings hyperlocal forecasts for Premium Plus subscribers appeared first on xda-developers.
description: AccuWeather has introduced hyperlocal weather forecasts for Premium Plus subscribers. It's a reccuring subscription that costs $19.99 a year.
